original_text: but I did not believe the reports until I came and my own eyes had seen it. And behold, the half was not told me. Your wisdom and prosperity surpass the report that I heard.
korean_text: 내가 그 말들을 믿지 아니하였더니 이제 와서 친히 본즉 내게 말한 것은 절반도 못되니 당신의 지혜와 복이 내가 들은 소문보다 더하도다

sentences.original_text: but I did not believe the reports
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 나는 그 소문을 믿지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: and my own eyes had seen it
the half was not told me
Your wisdom and prosperity surpass the report
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 지혜와 번영은 그 소문을 뛰어넘습니다
